Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: This Instrument Prepared By: Northeast State Technical Community College Office of Vice President for Business Affairs 2425 Highway 75 Blountville, TN 37617 Use Agreement This Agreement, entered into as of this ^t^>day of , 20 0%, made by and between the Tennessee Board of Regents, on behalf of Northeast State Technical Community College, hereinafter called the Owner, and Tusculum College, hereinafter called the User. WITNESSETH: A. This Agreement provides for the User to have access to and use of certain facilities of the Owner for specific hours and days, with the Owner retaining the facilities for its own use during other times, and the Owner retaining responsibility for normal utilities, security, upkeep, maintenance, and custodial care. The general Terms and Conditions (Attachment A) are hereby made a part of this Agreement as fully as if incorporated verbatim herein, and are those contained in pages 4 and 5 of this agreement. B. TERM OF AGREEMENT: The term of this Agreement shall commence on September 1, 2008 and shall end on Notice for Termination shall be 90 days. August 31, 2009 . Normal C. RENTAL shall be: $30,684.00 , payable in installments of $2,557.00 per month . D. NOTICES shall be addressed: to Owner at: to User at: Northeast State Technical Community College Office of Vice President for Business Affairs P. O. Box 246 Blountville, TN 37617 Tusculum College Office of Vice President and Chief Financial Officer P. O. Box 5100 Greeneville, TN 37743 E. LOCATION: The Owner hereby agrees to let the User access and make use of certain premises with the appurtenances situated in the County of Washington , City of Gray , located at 120 Dillon Court , and more particularly described as follows: (1) Primary Use Area: The User will have full use of this area: Area Sq. Ft. Room #108 Large ITV Classroom 855 Room #127 Classroom (25 seats) 592 Room #102 Small Classroom (15 seats) 462 Room #111 Office 93 Room #112 Office 93 Total Primary Sq. Ft. 2,095 (2) Secondary Use Area: The User will be further permitted to use these common areas on the same premises: Restrooms (486 sq. ft. x 20%) 97 sq. ft. (3) Restricted Area: The User will refrain from entering or using these areas: None (4) During the Term of this Use Agreement, the User shall have use of Primary and Secondary areas during the following periods: No restrictions on use periods. (5) Exceptions to the normal periods of use, due to Owner closings for holidays or other reasons, include: September 1,2008 November 27, 2008 November 28, 2008 December 24, 2008 through January 2, 2009 January 19, 2009 April 10, 2009 May 25, 2009 July 3, 2009 (6) Specific scheduling of User’s activities on the premises shall be managed by: Steven R. Campbell (7) The User shall generally confine its activities on premises to the following purposes: Education F. ADDITIONAL TERMS: Northeast State agrees to: Provide to Stephen Gehret, Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, keys to the facility. Tusculum agrees to: 1. Designate a lead instructor who is responsible for the facility and its contents during the time Tusculum teaches classes in the building. This individual will: unlock the doors and admit Tusculum students into the facility during days when Tusculum classes will meet; lock the facility when classroom instruction begins; unlock and lock the facility during scheduled breaks to include lunch; ensure that all students, faculty, and/or other individuals have exited the building after classes end; and lock the facility upon exit. 2. Ensure that students know of and adhere to Northeast State’s policy that the use of all tobacco products is prohibited within the facility. 3. Protect the facility equipment and other contents. 4. Ensure that the faculty and students adhere to the policies and procedures of Northeast State. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, this Agreement has been executed by the parties hereto: Owner BY: William W. Locke, President Northeast State Technical Community College BY: Charles W. Manning, Chancellor Tennessee Board of Regents User BY
